CIRCULAR  NO.  10 /  2002 
 
SUB: TARMAC TRANSFER OF PASSENGERS. 
 
The issue regarding tarmac to tarmac transfer of passenger and their 
baggage was under consideration in this Bureau . After  due examination it has 
been decided that: 
 
(i) 
Transfer of passenger from one aircraft to another aircraft on the tarmac 
may be allowed if it is a direct transfer of passenger from aircraft to aircraft 
on the tarmac without any delay. 
 
(ii) 
In the above case, only secondary security check of such passengers 
shall be done at the ladder point by the Airlines Security Staff. 
 
However, as regards transit passengers security check of such 
passengers shall be done again in the terminal building if they disembark at the 
transit station due to some urgent genuine cause. 
 
(R. K. Singh) 
Addl Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
Case NO.CAS-7(2)-2/96-Div-1  Date   : 21.03.2002
